alert.note: Alert for Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 3:07PM EST until January 07 at 12:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Portions of southern Connecticut and southeast New York. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New London
